WorkItem.Description:
Demonic Pact warlocks bring a spell power raid buff using Demonic Pact. The goal of this feature is to enable optimizing gear for that spell power buff (10% of spell dmg). Currently, the optimizer will happily prioritize a 2 dps improvement over a 20 SP improvement (which brings 2 dps to everyone in the raid).
Â 
Suggestion: Add a criteria to the optimizer to set a priority to place on spell power (much like survivability for other classes).  Also enable setting a minimum (e.g., 2800 in order to be as good as totem of wrath).
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Warlock] Spell Power optimization for (Demonic Pact) Warlocks

Comments.Message: Sounds like a good idea but I would settle for a RAWR version that worked at all for warlocks!
I'd love to see this, too!  I just set my second spec to Demo just for this raid buff, and I'd like to maximize its potential.

I downloaded the source and added this feature.  I'll figure out how to submit it as a patch sometime, but I'm pretty sure it's not going to work right until pets are implemented (since your pet's crit%, int and stam all affect the raid buff).

Added in 51212.



** Closed by xemnosyst 6/6/2010 2:24 PM
